member.name: IMFCaptureEngineOnEventCallback.OnEvent
member.summary: Called by the capture engine to notify the application of a capture event.
member.param: A pointer to the interface. Use this interface to get information about the event, as described in Remarks.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCaptureEngineOnEventCallback
member.summary: Callback interface for receiving events from the capture engine.
